channel.title: CogWorks Off-Topic

item.title: unlimited ammo mutator?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ssj4)
item.dc:creator: ssj4
item.content:encoded:
i do not know were the hell i should post this topic so ill just post it here...

anyone know were to get an unlimited ammo mutator for UT2003? if so, please do tell.
see iv found one (here) but whenever i install it run the game and click on instant action the game stops running and it gives this error message.
Code:
UT2003 Build UT2003_Build_[2003-04-07_17.42]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU:...
unlimited ammo mutator?

item.title: downloading CogWorks files
item.author: invalid@example.com (StoneViper)
item.dc:creator: StoneViper
item.content:encoded:
The Website has been down for many months. I'm working on getting it back up as you are reading this. During that time you have not been able to download any maps/mutators/etc from CogWorks. For this i apologize.

This thread is assurance that i am working on the site and you will soon be able to download anything CogWorksmade, as well as view our progress on our current project.

item.title: Cogworks is removing members!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cursed_Soul)
item.dc:creator: Cursed_Soul
item.content:encoded:
Posting this on the general forum,
Cogworks is reconstructing,
we are removing members that are inactive,
if we accidently removed you from the cogworks list, please pm me.
we will also look for new members, but first we will make a plan for the future,
thinking about what kind of stuff we want to focus on,
i.e. mods, maps, mutators etc.

thats all for this little update.


cogworks.
